COMMAND.NAME: windowssetframewindowplacement
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Change the position and size of the outer e93 frame window
COMMAND.PARAMETER: top The position from the top of the screen to the top of the window.
left The position from the left side of the screen to the left side of the window.
bottom The position of the bottom of the window from the top of the screen.
right The position of the right side of the window from the left side of the screen.

showcmd Specifies how the window should be displayed.
normal Activates and displays the window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position.
maximize Maximizes the window.
minimize Minimizes the window and activates the next top-level window in the z-order.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Change the position and size of the outer e93 frame window
